sect2.title: Introduction to Vim
sect2.para: The vim package, which is an abbreviation for VI IMproved, contains a vi clone with extra features as compared to the original vi.

The default LFS instructions install LFS as a part of the base system, but owing to the lack of X libraries during the base install, vim needs to be recompiled once X is installed to enable the GUI mode. There is no need for special instructions since X support is automatically detected.
